title: Ulysses S Grant National Historic Site: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Volunteers You can get involved by volunteering at Ulysses S. Grant National Historic Site. Volunteers assist at the visitor center's information desk. Many participate in special events and living history programs. Volunteers are also needed to help with light cleaning in the museum and historic home. If you enjoy history, talking to people from around the country (and sometimes the world,) or want to help preserve this historic site, contact us about volunteer opportunities. Support Your Park Visit our bookstore and with every purchase you make, you are supporting our education and general public programs.  Sustainability Check out the different ways the park is working to conserve energy and natural resources.
